Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: (Well, that Jack seems really strict, and that's something to take into account but... That's not what's relevant here.)
Thomas B: (It is something to have a note on, yes, but there was something else that stood out the most.)
Thomas B: (And in fact, reveals that despite being strict, there are things that escape his grasp...)

Elections.CandidateName: They seem to not have been the first people to discover this server
A member had a suspiciously familiar sounding name
